QuestData.Title: Captive Audience
QuestData.Description: The Sunreavers will stoop to even the lowest levels to get what they want, $n.$b$bI received reports earlier that several Kirin Tor have gone missing. I suspect the Sunreavers may have something to do with this.$b$bHopefully they have not been harmed, or my wrath will be swift and terrible. I trust you to bring them back in one piece, but please hurry.
QuestData.LogDescription: Free 5 Kirin Tor Captives near Dawnseeker Promontory.
